There is missionary work to be done in many unpromising places. Now is our time and opportunity to do this work. God requires that believers shall take up the work that is waiting to be done, and do it with earnestness and diligence.--Letter 80, 1911, pp. 1-4. (To S. N. Haskell, October 6, 1911.) 

Released February 1, 1978.
